summary: Before deciding I was a punk guy in high school, I was a jazz guy.  I was rescued from staying that way by the guy who sat in front of me in American History and sensed some hope for me.  He made a tape with the Repo Man soundtrack on
title: On Metal

summary:
Hello. 

Welcome, to another episode of, Which task managing BS is Gabz into now. 

Finding the ideal system for me to wrangle my mind and manage the crazy, ever-changing, chaotic
title: Managing tasks between two worlds.

summary: From using Prodigy on an IBM 286 to having the Internet in my pocket, there have been lots of memorable moments
title: Memorable Internet Moments

summary:
This vulnerability hacks a feature that allows ChatGPT to have long-term memory, where it uses information from past conversations to inform future conversations with that same user.  A researcher found that he could use that feature to plant “false memories” into that context window that could subvert the model. 
A month later, the researcher submitted a new disclosure statement...
title: Hacking ChatGPT by Planting False Memories into Its Data

summary:
> LINK · 'Bop Spotter' website by Riley Walz
This is so clever.  A solar-powered Android phone installed high above part of San Fransisco which constantly reports back what songs are being played nearby. 
It spots bops...
title: > The Bop Spotter

summary: Having decided to move my blog back here from Wordpress some time in September, it was natural for me to choose Robert Birming's new Bearming theme as my template, given all the great add-ons he's created for it.  I love that we now have images with softer rounded corners.  They look nicer...
title: My Timeline
